Class Rooster

com.toropov.oleg.entity.Entity

com.toropov.oleg.entity.herbivore.Chickens
com.toropov.oleg.entity.herbivore.Rooster
public class Rooster extends Chickens
Represents a rooster in the simulation. Roosters can move towards grass or find a hen to reproduce.

  • Method Details

    • isSquareAvailableForMove

      public boolean isSquareAvailableForMove(Coordinates coordinates, WorldMap map)
      Checks if the specified square is available for the rooster to move into. A square is considered available if it is empty, contains grass, or contains a hen when reproduction is needed.
      Overrides:
      isSquareAvailableForMove in class Herbivore
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the square to check
      map - the world map
      Returns:
      true if the square is available for the rooster to move into, false otherwise
